data.title: Center for Leadership Development
data.text:
The Center for Leadership Development (CLD) provides federal employees and agencies with dynamic and innovative leadership and professional development solutions. Our portfolio of courses and programs transforms today’s employees into tomorrow’s leaders through learning that inspires action. We offer:

Leadership development courses based on the Executive Core Qualifications (ECQs)

Customized leadership programs for agencies

Specialized training for HR professionals

Courses and project-based learning opportunities in:

Human-centered design and customer experience

Process and performance improvement

Streamlined hiring and development through the Presidential Management Fellows Program.

Learning technology and assisted acquisition solutions through USALearning®

Why CLD?

For over 50 years, we’ve delivered on our mission of developing visionary leaders to transform government. We provide a comprehensive array of leadership development options to strengthen individuals and organizations.

Through virtual learning settings, classrooms in Charlottesville, Va., Washington, DC., and in agency locations, our experienced faculty, facilitators, and consultants guide individuals and agencies in applying knowledge and skills to address today’s public sector challenges.

Our mission is to develop visionary leaders to transform government. Our offerings are built on foundational public service values and competencies that transcend professions and missions. Grounded in the latest public and private research, our programs and services help transform people and organizations, focusing on contemporary challenges through the lens of government. This approach fosters the exchange of ideas, best practices, and resources to strengthen and improve individuals and agencies.

Developing visionary leaders

We believe great leaders can transform and improve government to best serve the American people. Whether you are an aspiring leader, new supervisor, or seasoned executive, our career-spanning, multilevel leadership curriculum guides you through development and career growth – for your current role or the one you aspire to.

Our curriculum is built upon OPM’s Executive Core Qualifications (ECQs) and competencies that represent guideposts on the path to career and organizational success.

Our leadership programs are offered:

For individuals through our portfolio of leadership development courses.

For agencies through group deliveries of leadership development courses or customized leadership programs.

Building capacity to solve challenges

Our project-based learning approach helps agencies to solve public sector, complex challenges around people, processes, and performance while building their capacity through training and participatory learning.

First, our consultants guide you in thinking how customized innovation programs can meet your agency’s unique needs. Then, we help you apply design mindsets, approaches, and methods to address those immediate needs.

This approach equips your agency’s employees with improvement, innovation, and design capabilities to apply to transformation initiatives.

Human-centered design: The Lab at OPM offers project-based learning in human-centered design to support capabilities in:

Customer experience design

Community and user research and engagement

Equity initiatives

Problem framing

Strategic planning

Service design

Program design

Organizational development

Operations and business systems

Process improvement: Offered through OPM's Process & Performance Improvement Program, our improvement capabilities include:

Utilizing data to shape critical public sector processes

Supporting the shift of time and energy from low-value to high-value work, and

Uncovering root causes of process challenges

Improving HR capabilities

Our specialized HR training, offered through the Federal HR Institute, directly supports the government-wide initiative to grow HR workforce capability. The program of study establishes a single, standardized framework based on career mapping for federal HR practitioners, developing skills in staffing, classification, compensation, and Delegated Examining. All courses offered by the Federal HR Institute can be taken individually or delivered as agency cohorts (in person or online).

Overview

Give your employees the leadership and professional development skills and technologies they need to excel at all levels of your organization. Our experts work with you to address specific needs, offering comprehensive solutions to support your workforce and address your agency’s challenges.

Group development solutions

Whether your agency needs a group delivery of a current course or completely customized solution, we can design a program that meets the scope and size of your organization.

Learn more about group training solutions for your agency:

Leadership development:

Group deliveries of our leadership development courses

Customized leadership programs

Human-centered design

Process and performance improvement

HR development

Project-based learning

Work to solve real organizational problems while building capacity within your teams. Our project-based learning solutions in human-centered design and process and performance improvement help government organizations conduct projects that result in groundbreaking and innovative outcomes.

Learn more about project-based learning partnership opportunities.

Simplified access to learning technology

Our e-Learning services, offered through USALearning®, support the federal workforce and agencies through simplified, one-stop access to current and next generation learning technologies and environments.

Learning ecosystems: Integrated, cloud-based learning platforms can be customized to support your agency's unique mission. We guide you in determining the best solution based on your requirements - including learning and talent management systems, hosting, learning content management, and more.

Training development and design: Training and educational content often requires custom development to ensure relevancy to the competency being trained. Let our experts help you design, develop, and implement training for your government organization.

Learn more about USALearning® services.

Streamlined hiring and development

Recruit and develop top talent at GS 9-12 levels through the Presidential Management Fellows (PMF) program. Select and onboard prequalified candidates from across a variety of academic disciplines to meet your agency’s staffing needs. During the two-year appointment, Fellows engage in developmental programs and assignments that transform them into the problem solvers, strategic thinkers, and leaders that will shape your organization's future.

Learn more about the Presidential Management Fellows (PMF) program.

Contact

Contact us to bring any of these services to your agency.
